text: There was a point in all this that Kanye nonsense that I actually felt was relevant - the guy, love him or hate him, is trying to legitimately design things.  He's not just slapping his name on other people's designs.  It was pretty lame for someone to criticize his "aura" and his "attitude" as being diva-ish...at New York Fashion Week, the existence of which is to promote diva designers (male and female).  And for the record, I think his music has gone down the tubes and his Grammy behavior is bratty and embarrassing, but I kind of think he had a right to stick up for himself on this one.
"the purpose (not existence) of which..."

attachments.title: Ikea is launching a new line of furniture that can charge your phone without wires
attachments.text: It will work with any smartphone or tablet that supports the Qi wireless power standard.
